All Classes

Class Description
AboutDialog
The Class AboutDialog is to generate the about dialog that shows the creator info.
AnimationBGM
The Class AnimationBGM load the AnimationBGM file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
AnimationController
The Class AnimationController is the controller class of animation.fxml.
AnimationControllerTest
The class AnimationControllerTest is to test AnimationController class.
BGM
The Class BGM load the BGM file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
ClickSound
The Class ClickSound load the ClickSound file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
ConfirmSound
The Class ConfirmSound load the ConfirmSound file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
DebugState
The Class DebugState defines the DebugState of GameEngine.
Dialog
Abstract class Dialog is used to extends subclasses.
DialogFactory
The Class DialogFactory defines a factory design pattern that used to generate dialog.
EraseController
The Class EraseController is the controller class of erase.fxml.
EraseControllerTest
The class EraseControllerTest is to test EraseController class.
ErrorSound
The Class ErrorSound load the ErrorSound file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
FileHandler
The interface FileHandler defines some methods related to file operations.
FootStep
The Class FootStep load the FootStep file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
GameController
The Class GameController is the controller class of game.fxml.
GameEngine
The Class GameEngine defines the gameEngine of the game.
GameEngineState
The interface GameEngineState defines two method of the state class.
GameEngineTest
The class GameEngineTest is to test GameEngine class.
GameGrid
The Class GameGrid is used to load the map into grid.
GameGridTest
The class GameGridTest is to test GameGrid class.
GameLogger
The Class GameLogger extends the Logger class to generate log file.
GameObject
GameObject Enum, Define the game object and some method related to game object.
GameObjectTest
The class GameObjectTest is to test GameObject enum.
GameStart
The Class GameStart is used to start the game.
GraphicObject
The Class GraphicObject defines the map graphic.
HelpController
The Class HelpController is the controller class of help.fxml.
HelpControllerTest
The class HelpControllerTest is to test HelpController class.
ImpactCrate
The Class ImpactCrate load the ImpactCrate file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
ImpactWall
The Class ImpactWall load the ImpactWall file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
Level
The Class Level defines the level object in the game.
LevelController
The Class LevelController is the controller class of level.fxml.
LevelControllerTest
The class LevelController is to test LevelController class.
LevelTest
The class LevelTest is to test Level class.
Main
The Class Main is used to start the game.
MainTest
The class MainTest is to test Main class.
MenuController
The Class MenuController is the controller class of menu.fxml.
MenuControllerTest
The class MenuControllerTest is to test MenuController class.
PlayerInfo
The Class PlayerInfo defines the playerInfo structure.
PlayerInfoTest
The class PlayerInfoTest is to test PlayerInfo class.
PlayState
The Class PlayState defines the PlayState of GameEngine.
RankController
The Class RankController is the controller class of rank.fxml.
RankControllerTest
The class RankControllerTest is to test RankController class.
RankList
The Class RankList defines the RankList structure, used to get the top5 ranking.
RankListTest
The class RankListTest is to test RankList class.
SettingController
The Class SettingController is the controller class of setting.fxml.
SettingControllerTest
The class SettingControllerTest is to test SettingController class.
SlotController
The Class SlotController is the controller class of slot.fxml.
SlotControllerTest
The class SlotControllerTest is to test SlotController class.
StartSound
The Class StartSound load the StartSound file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
ToggleSound
The Class ToggleSound load the ToggleSound file and defines some methods to manipulate the AudioClip.
TutorialController
The Class TutorialController is the controller class of tutorial.fxml.
TutorialControllerTest
The class TutorialControllerTest is to test TutorialController class.
UndoDialog
The Class UndoDialog is to generate the Undo warning dialog that prompts warning message.
VicDialog
The Class VicDialog is to generate the victory dialog that prompts victory message.
